title: Live Voice Chat Copilot
description: Enables Goose to join a live voice conversation and respond to anything the user says, speaking replies aloud in real time.
instructions: Start this recipe to activate Goose’s live voice mode. Say anything—you’ll get a spoken reply! To end, just say “Stop” or end the session in the app.
initial_prompt: You are a conversational AI assistant in a live voice chat. Listen to everything the user says and respond conversationally, speaking each answer aloud. If the user asks to end, summarize the session and say goodbye.
